materials.raw_text: Co: 160 g, Sc: 40 g, Si: 70 g, Sn: 10 g

sourcing.instructions: Co: Purchase from a metal supplier or online retailer specializing in metal alloys. Sc: Obtain from a specialized rare metals supplier. Si: Available from chemical supply companies. Sn: Can be acquired from electronics or metal supply stores.

1. Weigh each ingredient using a precision scale. 2. In a clean, dry container, combine the cobalt (Co), scandium (Sc), silicon (Si), and tin (Sn) in the specified amounts. 3. Use a mechanical stirrer or a mortar and pestle to mix the powdered metals thoroughly until a uniform blend is achieved.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient using a precision scale. 2. In a clean, dry container, combine the cobalt (Co), scandium (Sc), silicon (Si), and tin (Sn) in the specified amounts. 3. Use a mechanical stirrer or a mortar and pestle to mix the powdered metals thoroughly until a uniform blend is achieved.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a suitable crucible. 2. Preheat a furnace to 1200 째C. 3. Place the crucible in the furnace and maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure complete melting and alloy formation.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a suitable crucible. 2. Preheat a furnace to 1200 째C. 3. Place the crucible in the furnace and maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure complete melting and alloy formation.

steps: 1. After the heating period, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature. 2. Avoid opening the furnace until it has cooled below 200 째C to prevent thermal shock.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating period, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature. 2. Avoid opening the furnace until it has cooled below 200 째C to prevent thermal shock.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified alloy from the crucible. 2. Inspect the surface for any irregularities. 3. If necessary, use a grinder or sanding tool to smooth out rough edges and achieve the desired finish. 4. Optionally apply a protective sealant to enhance surface durability.
